title: How to use Telegram’s new auto-delete timer feature
content:
Telegram has had an option to send ephemeral messages in its encrypted Secret Chat mode since 2013. Last year, it rolled out a new timer feature — that could be enabled for either 24 hours or 7 days — to auto-delete messages for all Telegram chats. Over the weekend, the app updated this function to allow a custom auto-delete timer for all conversations. Plus, unlike the previous version, it doesn’t require you to delete chat history on the Android app. Before you use this feature, make sure to update your Telegram app. Here’s how to use it: Open the Telegram…

description: A guide for using Telegram's new customer timer for auto-deleting messages for all kinds of conversations.
